overview: Collection of four short films from Nova. "Under Construction" — Two construction workers stretch their foreman's capacities to the maximum. "The Boiler Room" — Repairs on a big boiler are interrupted as these two studs create cum-boiling pressures of their own. "Head For The Showers" — Angry at having been sent to the showers, two prime athletes work out their frustrations in hot, horny sex action. "Half Time" — Here's a linebacker with a big, hard problem that pops up when he's alone in the lockerroom.
title: Under Construction
